price: 108. Kuriuose jie gyvens (amžinai). Neturės jie jokio troškimo būti iš jo perkeltais.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
